languages.text: "Кассия — преемница той, что связала Монолит душ с телами навигаторов. Выслушай ее. Она отличается от своей предшественницы".

traits.locale_text: "Кассия — преемница той, что связала Камень Душ с телами Навигаторов. Выслушай ее. Она отличается от своей предшественницы".

languages.text: "Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."
languages.original_text: "Кассия — преемница той, что связала Монолит душ с телами навигаторов. Выслушай ее. Она отличается от своей предшественницы".

traits.locale_text: "Cassia is the inheritor of she who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to her words. She is not the woman her predecessor was."
"Cassia is the inheritor of she who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to her words. She is not the woman her predecessor was."
"Cassia is the inheritor of she who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."
"Cassia is the inheritor of she who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."
"Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."
"Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."

languages.text: 「カシアが、スピリット・モノリスを航宙士の身体に縛りつけた者の後継だ。その意見が何であれ、耳を傾けよ。彼女は前任の女とは違う」
languages.original_text: "Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."

traits.locale_text: 「カシアが、スピリット・モノリスを航宙士の身体に縛りつけた者の後継だ。その意見が何であれ、耳を傾けよ。彼女は前任の女とは違う」

languages.text: “那个把巨型灵魂石嵌入导航者身体的人，是卡西娅的前任大族长，卡西娅是她的继承人。听听卡西娅的意见吧，她与她的前任大族长并不一样。”
languages.original_text: "Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."

traits.locale_text: “那个把巨型灵魂石嵌入导航者身体的人，是卡西娅的前任大族长，卡西娅是她的继承人。听听卡西娅的意见吧，她与她的前任大族长并不一样。”

languages.text: « Si Cassia est l'héritière de celle qui a lié le Monolithe aux esprits aux corps des navigateurs, cela ne veut pas pour autant dire qu'elle lui ressemble. Vous devriez écouter ce qu'elle a à dire. »
languages.original_text: "Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."

traits.locale_text: « Si Cassia est l'héritière de celle qui a lié le Monolithe aux esprits aux corps des navigateurs, cela ne veut pas pour autant dire qu'elle lui ressemble. Vous devriez écouter ce qu'elle a à dire. »

languages.text: «Cassia es la heredera de la persona que vinculó el Monolito Espiritual a los cuerpos de los Navegantes. Escucha lo que tiene que decir. Es muy distinta a su predecesora».
languages.original_text: "Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."

traits.locale_text: «Cassia es la heredera de la mujer que vinculó el Monolito Espiritual a los cuerpos de los Navegantes. Escucha lo que tiene que decir. Es muy distinta a su predecesora».

languages.text: "Cassia ist die Erbin der Frau, die den Geistesmonolith an die Körper der Navigatoren gebunden hat. Hört sie an. Sie ist nicht die Frau, die ihre Vorgängerin war."
languages.original_text: "Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."

traits.locale_text: "Cassia ist die Erbin der Frau, die den Geistesmonolith an die Körper der Navigatoren gebunden hat. Hört sie an. Sie ist nicht die Frau, die ihre Vorgängerin war."

languages.text: "Cassia, Ruh Monoliti'ni Rotacıların bedenlerine bağlayanın vârisidir. Diyeceklerine kulak ver. Cassia, atasından çok farklı bir kadındır."
languages.original_text: "Cassia is the inheritor of the one who bound the Spirit Monolith to the Navigators' bodies. Listen to whatever she has to say. She is not the woman her predecessor was."

traits.locale_text: "Cassia, Ruh Monoliti'ni Rotacıların bedenlerine bağlayan kişinin vârisidir. Diyeceklerine kulak ver. Cassia, atasından bambaşka bir kadındır."
